title: [Self-Directed] Analysis of Factors Influencing Student Performance in Web-Based Learning (WBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis methodologies and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Research design and data collection methodology learning for analyzing factors influencing WBL outcomes among engineering students

learning_goals: Grade-influencing factors in web-based learning environments can be analyzed using structural models
Learners can explain online survey design and data collection processes
Learners can perform statistical analysis procedures using structural equation modeling (SEM)
Learners can evaluate the moderating effect of gender on WBL outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
